teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Friends of PAC in Nicaragua
teams.loan_because: We support the work of PAC in providing opportunities to agricultural entrepreneurs through loans, technical support, and market access.  Available credit in Nicaragua’s agricultural sector is extremely limited, as such, we understand the importance of providing loan capital to help sustainably alleviate poverty throughout the country’s rural communities.
teams.description: PAC (Association for People in Community Action) is a community development organization in Nicaragua. They focus on rural productive value chain integration by offering their borrowers three primary services: loans, technical assistance, and access to markets.  Loans give clients the ability to maintain farmland and expand production.  Technical assistance helps farmers with business strategy and empowers them with the knowledge necessary to improve crop yields.  Market access services link producers to buyers, which can be facilitated through their assistance with helping farmers obtain various certifications for organic and/or sustainably grown products, such as Fair Trade, 4C, and Starbucks’ C.A.F.E Practices.  Through their comprehensive model, PAC empowers borrowers with the knowledge, resources, and connections that lead to sustainable success.

teams.name: Friends of Tecnosol
teams.loan_because: We support the work of Tecnosol in providing renewable energy solutions to rural populations of Nicaragua via credit.  We believe in empowering people to sustainably improve their lives and businesses through the benefits of clean energy.
teams.description: Tecnosol is the Central American leader in the sale and installation of decentralized renewable energy sources, including solar, wind, hydro, and biogas.  Their credit program expands access to their equipment by offering it to populations who would otherwise lack the financial capacity to obtain it.  People are able to pay for the equipment over time through savings from the use of inefficient energy sources and economic opportunity provided by the functionality of the equipment.

teams.name: Pueblos en Accion Comunitaria Friends
teams.loan_because: we want to support Pueblos en Acción Comunitaria Coffee Farmers
teams.description: We help them, we grow with them

teams.name: Atheist Ireland - Good Without Gods
teams.loan_because: we wish to improve the world, ourselves and each other.
teams.description: Atheist Ireland is an Irish advocacy group. We promote atheism and reason over superstition and supernaturalism, and we promote an ethical, secular society where the State does not support, finance or give special treatment to any religion.

teams.name: Supporting Widows and Single Parents
teams.loan_because: Widows and single parents face unique challenges in life. We just want to make it a bit easier for them.
teams.description: We loan to entrepreneurs who have been widowed or who are single parents.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: España - Spain
teams.loan_because: Kiva ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos que no pueden acceder a los canales normales de financiación y que, gracias a los micro-créditos, pueden  desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
teams.description:
Este club se creó con la intención inicial de fomentar la participación de españolas y españoles en Kiva, no obstante,  está abierto a todas las personas que deseen unirse a él, sin importar su nacionalidad ni ninguna otra condición.
 
El único referente identitario de este grupo es la solidaridad y la convicción de que, a través de Kiva, es posible el apoyo a personas o grupos emprendedores que buscan y merecen una oportunidad por su esfuerzo.

teams.name: Albuquerque CSL
teams.loan_because: We believe that we need to take care of each other on the planet and that no one should suffer from lack. Hunger and suffering and dying because of poverty. "It doesn't have to be that way."
teams.description: We are a community of oprimistic, caring people who are happy to join the millions of you across the world making loans to help people lift themselves up from poverty to form a huge, powerful community and therefore a world movement to end poverty, fueled by caring and knowing we make a difference.

teams.name: Kiva Detroit
teams.loan_because: We want to champion small businesses in Detroit!
teams.description:
Kiva Detroit is the first Kiva City, a program where Kiva works with community organizations in the United States to provide local small businesses with microloans. 

The goal of the Kiva Detroit team is to empower Detroiters to champion local small businesses through Kiva. 

To double your impact, your loan to a Kiva Detroit borrower will be matched 1-to-1 by the Knight Foundation

teams.name: Jeffco Productions
teams.loan_because: It's fun!
teams.description: We're a group of like-minded people who enjoy having fun and helping other people. Please, feel free to join us!

teams.name: Atheist Ireland - Good Without Gods
teams.loan_because: we wish to improve the world, ourselves and each other.
teams.description: Atheist Ireland is an Irish advocacy group. We promote atheism and reason over superstition and supernaturalism, and we promote an ethical, secular society where the State does not support, finance or give special treatment to any religion.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Kiva Mormons
teams.loan_because: "A man filled with the love of God is not content with blessing his family alone, but ranges through the whole world, anxious to bless the whole human race." ~ Joseph Smith

teams.name: Totally Vegetarian
teams.loan_because: we advocate a plant-based lifestyle for its benefits of health to the individual, compassion for animals, and sustainability for the environment. We only encourage loans that are vegan oriented businesses, i.e., no animal products or animal agriculture involved.
teams.description: Totally Vegetarian is a Michigan based national nonprofit that encourages the funding of vegan projects worldwide. We recommend Kiva because we do not have the resources to duplicate their efforts and infrastructure.

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

teams.name: Knights of Columbus Council #3962
teams.loan_because: Charity is one of our most important guiding principles.
teams.description: Our Catholic faith teaches us to “Love thy neighbor as thyself.” Members of the Knights of Columbus show love for their neighbors by conducting food drives and donating the food to local soup kitchens and food pantries, by volunteering at Special Olympics, and by supporting, both spiritually and materially, mothers who choose life for their babies. Knights recognize that our mission, and our faith in God, compels us to action. There is no better way to experience love and compassion than by helping those in need, a call we answer every day.

teams.name: George Fox
teams.loan_because:
"For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me.’

“Then the righteous will answer him, ‘Lord, when did we see you hungry and feed you, or thirsty and give you something to drink? When did we see you a stranger and invite you in, or needing clothes and clothe you? When did we see you sick or in prison and go to visit you?’

“The King will reply, ‘Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me.’" 

~Luke 6:38
teams.description: We are a group of students who are dedicated to serving others and serving God - growing closer to others and each other, by growing closer to God.

teams.name: Wanhat Parrat
teams.loan_because: On se vaan niin hieanoo!
teams.description: We are group of 30+ year old persons from Finland which have at least one common interest, manager game called Hattrick.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Kiva U Schools
teams.whereabouts: High Schools Across the United States

teams.name: Kiva Camp
teams.loan_because: ...Kiva’s socially driven, impact focused, and continually innovative model is inherently attractive to students and teachers around the world!
teams.description:
Kiva Camp is an innovative student leadership annual training retreat that brings together Campus Kiva and Kiva High School chapter leaders, as well as select educators from around the country for a 2-day camp filled with educational workshops, inspiring speakers, networking, and fun.

Putting resources into outreach with education groups is critical not only because cultivating engaged, compassionate, and well-informed global citizens fits with Kiva’s culture and long-term vision, but also because the targets of this outreach are going to grow up to be a different breed of philanthropists than have ever existed before. 

Today’s elementary, high school, and college-aged students are part of a generation that will force a shift in philanthropy. This is a generation that has grown up on the Internet, values social connection, and believes in their capacity to make a direct and tangible impact on the world.

teams.name: Ben Balto-Bongard Memorial Fund
teams.loan_because:
Ben believed microfinance helped people help themselves.  He dedicated his time and effort to building the Microfinance Alliance and educating people on ways they can get involved.  He believed in sustainable ways to help the poor by helping themselves.  

We will miss you.
teams.description: One of our founders of the Microfinance Alliance in Minnesota, USA passed away recently.  We started this team to honor him and keep his spirit alive and giving.

teams.name: World Domination Summit 2012
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference. We believe in BEING the change we wish to see. We want to track the progress, impact, and see the butterfly effect that this magical weekend had on us!
teams.description: In July 2012, a small army of remarkable people converged on Portland, Oregon for a weekend of strategizing and adventure. “Living a remarkable life in a conventional world” was one theme, and the audience was packed with diversity. Chris Guillebeau & an anonymous donor made a $100 investment in each of the attendees, and left US with a simple charge: put it to good use! Start a project, surprise someone, or do something entirely different. Some team members may use their $100 this way, others may just divert their normal Kiva lending to this team. I just wanted to TAKE immediate action and DO SOMETHING within 24 hours of returning home. This is it!

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Kiva Kiwis
teams.loan_because: Because Kiwis know what it is to pull yourself  up by your bootstraps.
teams.description: Started in Oamaru New Zealand by a group of friends wanting to encourage and to make it easy for Kiwis to make loans through Kiva.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

teams.name: GNU/Linux and Free Software
teams.loan_because: Microcredit and free software - both revolutionizing ideas, and great tools to bring power and opportunities to those who need it the most.
teams.description: We are here because we want to give people opportunities - and spread the word about free software that belongs to everybody.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Joyous Laughter...Dancers Helping the World!
teams.loan_because: We are blessed to have the joy of dance in our lives. It is a passion, a vocation, and a career. We wish to support others develop their passion, vocations, and careers as well!
teams.description: We are a collective of belly dancers, flamenco dancers, hula dancers, and more.

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: KivaFriends - Agriculture Loans
teams.loan_because: we want to reduce world hunger.  This includes loans for farming, livestock, poultry, and the like.
teams.description: Our group makes loans to people that create more food for those in the world.  Many of these entrepreneurs are farmers that often request loans to help them with their crops.  Many times these loans are for a longer repayment period.

teams.name: Vegetarians and Vegans on Kiva
teams.loan_because: We have a vision of a healthier, more compassionate and sustainable world. Hard work is often not enough to escape poverty and we gladly welcome the opportunity to give people and their businesses a fighting chance. Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: ICC
teams.loan_because: Impacting others for good is what Jesus calls us to do. We loan because it is the right thing to do with what God has blessed us with.
teams.description: An outward looking church that wants to make a difference. Our group was started by the kids in our church.

teams.name: Western Kentucky University
teams.loan_because: We want to share our Blessings.
teams.description:
A leading University with an international reach.
Located in Bowling Green, Western Kentucky University offers excellent undergraduate and graduate educational opportunities and is a leader in relevant research and public service.

teams.name: Khope International
teams.loan_because: We believe every child deserves a chance. That chance begins with a hot meal and roof over their head. We believe in education to empower families to better their circumstances.
teams.description: A non profit foundation dedicated to meeting the basic needs of children living in poverty

teams.name: KiVegas (Las Vegas Kiva)
teams.loan_because: It is our way of paying back for the millions of visitors to Las Vegas and the hope that many others might one day visit Las Vegas or basically a more productive way to invest funds we might otherwise lose at the craps table.
